alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Palm Beach County through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Canal Point to 6 miles east of Fremd Village-Padgett Island to 8 miles southwest of Lion Country Safari Park. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pahokee, Canal Point, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, Loxahatchee Groves, The Acreage and Loxahatchee NWR. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
